description:
The new Audubon Mushrooms is the most comprehensive and accurate guide to North American mushrooms and other fungi available to date. The app covers over 550 common species of mushrooms, other fungi and slime molds - enough info to please the mycologist in us all. Audubon Mushrooms features a comprehensive search function, stunning photography, current taxonomic information, complete species descriptions and reference material.

Content
• 992 beautiful color photographs detailing every species with extraordinary clarity
• Complete species information for every mushroom with comprehensive, up-to-date authoritative descriptions
• An extensive reference section from the National Audubon Society Field Guide to North American Mushrooms brought completely up-to-date including mushroom anatomy, identification, habitats and much more

App Functions
• Identify a sighting with accuracy. Search for a mushroom using multiple variables including characteristics of the cap, gills, stem and habitat.
• Browse by shape using the best silhouettes of any mushroom app, by name (common and scientific), or by order.
• Navigate the app with ease using an advanced and intuitive interface. Go back and forth between species information, personalized Life Lists and Sightings, search functions and more.

Feedback Welcome
• Send us your suggestions, comments or requests. We also welcome submissions of high quality photography of mushrooms and other species. You can contact us directly by selecting "Feedback" in the "More" section of the application.
Visit www.AudubonGuides.com for more information on our apps.
